verses.verse: <S%G1223>Therefore<s%> <S%G5124><s%> seeing we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1248>ministry,<s%> as we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1653>received<s%> <S%G1653>mercy,<s%> we <S%G1573>faint<s%> not;

But have <S%G550>renounced<s%> the <S%G2927>hidden<s%> things of <S%G152>dishonesty,<s%> not <S%G4043>walking<s%> in <S%G3834>craftiness,<s%> <S%G3366>nor<s%> <S%G1389>handling<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1389>deceitfully;<s%> but by <S%G5321>manifestation<s%> of the <S%G225>truth<s%> <S%G4921>commending<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man's<s%> <S%G4893>conscience<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
But <S%G1499>if<s%> our <S%G2098>gospel<s%> be <S%G2572>hid,<s%> it is <S%G2572>hid<s%> to them that are <S%G622>lost:<s%>

In <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G2316>god<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G165>world<s%> has <S%G5186>blinded<s%> the <S%G3540>minds<s%> of them which <S%G571>believe<s%> not, <S%G1519>lest<s%> the <S%G5462>light<s%> of the <S%G1391>glorious<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G3739>who<s%> is the <S%G1504>image<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> should <S%G826>shine<s%> to them.

For we <S%G2784>preach<s%> not <S%G1438>ourselves,<s%> but <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> and <S%G1438>ourselves<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G1401>servants<s%> for <S%G2424>Jesus'<s%> sake.

For <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2036>commanded<s%> the <S%G5457>light<s%> to <S%G2989>shine<s%> out of <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> has <S%G2989>shined<s%> in our <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> to give the <S%G5462>light<s%> of the <S%G1108>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> in the <S%G4383>face<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

But we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G5126>this<s%> <S%G2344>treasure<s%> in <S%G3749>earthen<s%> <S%G4632>vessels,<s%> that the <S%G5236>excellency<s%> of the <S%G1411>power<s%> may be of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and not of us.
We are <S%G2346>troubled<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G1722>every<s%> <S%G3956><s%> side, <S%G235>yet<s%> not <S%G4729>distressed;<s%> we are <S%G639>perplexed,<s%> but not in <S%G1820>despair;<s%>

<S%G3842>Always<s%> <S%G4064>bearing<s%> <S%G4064>about<s%> in the <S%G4983>body<s%> the <S%G3500>dying<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> that the <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> might be <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> in our <S%G4983>body.<s%>

For we <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2198>live<s%> are <S%G104>always<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to <S%G2288>death<s%> for <S%G2424>Jesus'<s%> sake, that the <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> might be <S%G5319>made<s%> <S%G5319>manifest<s%> in our <S%G2349>mortal<s%> <S%G4561>flesh.<s%>

We <S%G2192>having<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> as it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> I <S%G4100>believed,<s%> and <S%G1352>therefore<s%> have I <S%G2980>spoken;<s%> we <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4100>believe,<s%> and <S%G1352>therefore<s%> <S%G2980>speak;<s%>

<S%G1492>Knowing<s%> that he which <S%G1453>raised<s%> up the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> shall <S%G1453>raise<s%> up us <S%G2532>also<s%> by <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> and shall <S%G3936>present<s%> us with you.

For <S%G3956>all<s%> things are for <S%G5209>your<s%> sakes, that the <S%G4121>abundant<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> might <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G2169>thanksgiving<s%> of <S%G4119>many<s%> <S%G4052>redound<s%> to the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

For <S%G1352>which<s%> <S%G1352>cause<s%> we <S%G1573>faint<s%> not; but <S%G1499>though<s%> our <S%G1854>outward<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1311>perish,<s%> <S%G235>yet<s%> the <S%G2081>inward<s%> man is <S%G341>renewed<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> by <S%G2250>day.<s%>

For our <S%G1645>light<s%> <S%G2347>affliction,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is but for a <S%G3901>moment,<s%> <S%G2716>works<s%> for us a <S%G1519>far<s%> <S%G5236><s%> <S%G1519>more<s%> <S%G5236><s%> <S%G1519>exceeding<s%> <S%G5236><s%> and <S%G166>eternal<s%> <S%G922>weight<s%> of <S%G1391>glory;<s%>

While we <S%G4648>look<s%> not <S%G4648>at<s%> the things which are <S%G991>seen,<s%> but <S%G4648>at<s%> the things which are not <S%G991>seen:<s%> for the things which are <S%G991>seen<s%> are <S%G4340>temporal;<s%> but the things which are not <S%G991>seen<s%> are <S%G166>eternal.<s%>
